# Elide Documentation

> Comprehensive documentation for Elide - a high-performance polyglot runtime powered by GraalVM

## Getting Started
/docs/readme: Welcome to Elide and overview of the runtime
/docs/installation: Install Elide on your system
/docs/getting-started: Run your first code samples with Elide
/docs/quick-start: Build your first Elide application in minutes
/docs/runtime: Learn about the Elide polyglot runtime

## Documentation
/docs/cli-references: Complete CLI command reference
/docs/contributors: Contributing guidelines and contributor information
/docs/acknowledgements: Acknowledgements and credits
/docs/releases: Release notes and version history

## Core Concepts
/docs/architecture: System architecture and design principles
/docs/components: Core components of the Elide runtime
/docs/configuration: Configuration options and settings
/docs/security: Security features and best practices
/docs/performance: Performance optimization and benchmarks
/docs/compatibility: Language and feature compatibility matrix

## Fundamentals
/docs/env-variables: Environment variable configuration
/docs/file-system: File system access and operations
/docs/debugging: Debugging applications with Elide

## Advanced Topics
/docs/interop: Language interoperability features
/docs/servers: Building HTTP servers with Elide
/docs/deployment: Deploying Elide applications
/docs/connect-ide: IDE integration and development tools

## Language Support

### JavaScript & TypeScript
/docs/javascript: JavaScript support and features overview
/docs/typescript: TypeScript support and configuration
/docs/javascript-tools: JavaScript development tools

### Node.js API
/docs/javascript-node-api: Node.js API compatibility overview
/docs/javascript-node-assertions: Node.js assertions module
/docs/javascript-node-buffer: Node.js buffer module
/docs/javascript-node-child-process: Node.js child_process module
/docs/javascript-node-events: Node.js events module
/docs/javascript-node-filesystem: Node.js fs module
/docs/javascript-node-os: Node.js os module
/docs/javascript-node-path: Node.js path module
/docs/javascript-node-url: Node.js url module
/docs/javascript-node-zlib: Node.js zlib module

### Web APIs
/docs/javascript-web-apis: Web API compatibility overview
/docs/javascript-web-encoding: Web Encoding API (TextEncoder/TextDecoder)
/docs/javascript-web-url: Web URL API

### JavaScript Libraries
/docs/javascript-sqlite: SQLite database integration
/docs/javascript-wintertc: WinterTC library support

### Other Languages
/docs/python: Python language support
/docs/ruby: Ruby language support
/docs/pkl: Pkl configuration language support
/docs/webassembly: WebAssembly support

## API Reference
/docs/api-overview: API documentation overview
/docs/api-core: Core API reference
/docs/api-server: Server API reference
/docs/api-database: Database API reference

## Advanced Features
/docs/experimental-engines: Experimental language engines and features
